content.title: Chief Minister's COVID-19 Affected Livelihood Support Scheme
content.department: Dept. of Social Welfare, Govt. of Manipur
content.beneficiary: Vulnerable groups including daily wage earners and those without a regular source of income
content.details: The COVID-19 Pandemic and the resulting economic dislocations have severely affected the livelihood of a large percentage of the population, especially vulnerable groups including daily wage earners, those without a regular source of income, and without sufficient savings to fall back upon. There is a need to have additional direct income support for these vulnerable groups.
benefits: Direct Cash Transfer of ₹ 5,000/- in 2 equal installments (₹ 2,500/- per installment) to every identified family.
eligibility: Only those domiciled in Manipur can apply.
Only the main bread earner of the family can apply.
Applicant should be employed in the informal sector.
exclusions: Only one beneficiary per family can apply.
Persons domiciled in other Northeastern states cannot apply.
documents_required: Street Vendor card/list of Municipalities or District Councils (for Street Vendors)
Permit for public transport issued by Transport Dept./Municipalities/District Councils (for Public Transport Drivers)
School Van Permit/Certificate issued by the Transport Department / School Authority concerned (for School Van Drivers)
Copy of Registration/license/permit of beneficiaries issued by the relevant Department in connection with the above profession/occupation.
Copy of the bank passbook containing details of the bank account number, name & details of the bank, and name of the account holder.
In case the applicant does not have an Aadhaar Number, then the Deputy Commissioner must certify the claim and allow other documents to be submitted (voter ID, MGNREGA Job Card, etc.).

faqs.question: Can Women Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is open to applicants from all genders.

faqs.question: Is Aadhaar Enrolment Mandatory For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Aadhaar Enrolment is a must before the release of the 2nd installment.

faqs.question: What Is The Maximum Amount Of Financial Assistance That I Can Receive Through This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Direct Cash Transfer of ₹ 5,000/- in 2 equal installments (₹ 2,500/- per installment) to every identified family.

faqs.question: Will The Financial Assistance Be Paid In Installments Or As A Lump Sum?
faqs.answer: The financial assistance will be paid in 2 equal installments (₹ 2,500/- per installment).

faqs.question: What Is The Eligible Criteria Related To The Annual Income Of The Applicant?
faqs.answer: In this scheme, there is no eligible criteria related to the annual income of the applicant.

faqs.question: What Is The 'Inclusion Criteria' For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Inclusion Criteria (subject to exclusion criteria fulfillment): (a) Ration Card Holder. (b) MGNREGA Card Holder. (c) PM-KISAN Beneficiary. (d) CMHT/ PMJAY Beneficiary. (e) PMUY Beneficiary. (f) PM SVANidhi Beneficiary. (g) CMST/ CMAT Beneficiary. (h) PMAY (G) or PMAY (U) Beneficiary. (i) SBM (G) or SBM (U) Beneficiary. (j) Person in Vendor List of Municipalities or District Councils. (k) Person with a permit for public transport/ school van in Municipalities or District Councils.
